startMessage.line1: "Professional EQ measurement! What is your empathy ability level?"
startMessage.line2: How well do you understand others' emotions?
startMessage.line3: Can you feel what others are feeling?
startMessage.line4: Can you think from others' perspective?
startMessage.line5: Empathy is the core of relationships and
startMessage.line6: the most important element of emotional intelligence (EQ).

startMessage.line1: "Left brain? Right brain? We accurately analyze your brain tendencies!"
startMessage.line2: Logical vs Emotional / Analytical vs Creative / Planned vs Spontaneous / Verbal vs Visual
startMessage.line3: People with developed left brains are strong in logic and analysis, while people with developed right brains excel in creativity and emotion.
startMessage.line4: Which side are you? Or do you have perfect balance?
startMessage.line5: In just 3 minutes, you can know your brain type!

compatibility.Type1_Type2: Can have logical conversations with Left Brain Dominant type.
compatibility.Type2_Type3: Ideal combination with Perfect Balance type.
compatibility.Type4_Type3_Type5: Creative synergy with Perfect Balance and Extreme Right Brain types.
compatibility.Type5_Type4: Artistic empathy with Right Brain Dominant type.
compatibility.Type6_Type3: Flexible cooperation with Perfect Balance type.

caution.Type1_Type5: Communication may be difficult with Extreme Right Brain type.
caution.Type2_Type4: May have different approaches with Right Brain Dominant type.
caution.Type4_Type1: May have thinking conflicts with Extreme Left Brain type.
caution.Type5_Type1: Completely different world from Extreme Left Brain type.
caution.Type6_Type1_Type5: Understanding may be difficult with extreme types (Extreme Left/Right Brain).

startMessage.line1: "How efficiently do you use your 24 hours a day?"
startMessage.line2: 24 hours given equally to everyone, some people accomplish everything, some people say they don't have enough time.
startMessage.line3: Are you planned? Spontaneous? Do you meet deadlines? Always late? Do you control time? Are you chased by time?
startMessage.line4: In just 3 minutes, you can discover your time efficiency!

compatibility.Type1_Type2: Can create synergy with efficient practical types.
compatibility.Type2_Type1: Good cooperation is possible with time master and ordinary general types.
compatibility.Type3_all: Gets along well with all types.
compatibility.Type4_Type4: Free types can understand each other.
compatibility.Type5_Type5: Chronic late types can understand each other.
compatibility.Type6_Type6: When waste types are together, they can waste more.

caution.Type1_Type6: Time waste types are hard to understand.
caution.Type2_Type5: Conflicts may arise with chronic late types due to different time senses.
caution.Type3_Type1: May feel pressure from time master types due to different standards.
caution.Type4_Type1: Completely different world from time master types.
caution.Type5_Type1_Type2: Time master and efficient practical types are punctual and may cause stress.
caution.Type6_Type1: Time master types are hard to understand.

startMessage.title: "Tell the truth or protect feelings?"
startMessage.line1: "Honest speaking is true friendship!"
startMessage.line2: "Honesty without consideration is just violence."
startMessage.line3: Some people think truth is the best,
startMessage.line4: Some people prioritize not hurting feelings.
startMessage.line5: What do you value more: honesty or consideration?
startMessage.line6: Takes only 2 minutes! Choose quickly and intuitively ⚖️

startMessage.title: "How much can you feel other people's emotions?"
startMessage.line1: Some people feel others' pain as their own,
startMessage.line2: Some people understand but don't feel emotions.
startMessage.line3: Some people think of solutions before empathy,
startMessage.line4: Some people find it difficult to understand emotions themselves.
startMessage.line5: What is your level of empathy?
startMessage.line6: Check your empathy level with 12 questions, and get advice for better relationships!

startMessage.title: "How much can people trust and rely on you?"
startMessage.line1: People who keep promises religiously, people who take secrets to the grave,
startMessage.line2: people with good intentions but who forget things, people who find responsibility burdensome because they're free-spirited.
startMessage.line3: What kind of person are you?
startMessage.line4: Get tips on becoming a more trustworthy person!
startMessage.line5: Takes only 3 minutes! Please answer honestly 😊

startMessage.title: 「What type of person would be good to spend your life with?」
startMessage.line1: Love and marriage are different.
startMessage.line2: Do you want exciting love? Or do you want a comfortable companion?
startMessage.line3: Do you want to explore the world together? Or do you want to build a warm family?
startMessage.line4: Your ideal spouse type depends on your values, lifestyle, and future plans.
startMessage.line5: Find the spouse type that suits you best!
startMessage.line6: Recommended for those seriously thinking about marriage 💍
startMessage.line7: Takes only 4 minutes! Please answer carefully ✨

spouseTest.resultShareMessage: My ideal spouse is {type}! What type are you? Let's check before marriage 💍

mbti.shareInviteMessage: Curious? Try it directly on QuizOasis!
mbti.mbtiTestIntro:
No more complicated MBTI tests!
Extroverted? Introverted?
Realistic? Idealistic?
Logical? Emotional?
Planned? Spontaneous?
Which of the 16 personality types do you belong to?
Try it with friends, lovers, and family!
It's the first step to understanding each other's personalities.
In just 1 minute, discover your MBTI tendencies
and core personality traits!
mbti.stressTestIntro:
Explode? Endure? Avoid? Discover your stress coping style!
Sudden work demands from your boss,
Unexpected conflicts with friends,
Unforeseen problem situations...
Some people explode immediately,
Some people suppress their feelings,
Some people avoid the problem.
How do you react to stress?
Looking for healthier coping strategies?
In just 3 minutes, discover your stress response pattern
and better coping methods!
mbti.datingTestIntro:
Perfect plan? Spontaneous adventure? Or comfortable at home?

Someone who books restaurants a week in advance,
Someone who moves spontaneously asking "What should we do today?",
Someone who seeks comfort saying "Watch movies at home?"

What is your dating style?
Discover your true dating style with 12 questions,
and check compatibility with your partner!

Only 3 minutes! Try it with friends and lovers 😊
mbti.signalTestIntro:
Can you tell without saying 'I love you'?

"Had a tough day?" - Is it just a question or a signal of comfort?
Why is the message reply late? Busy? Angry?
What does it mean when they suddenly hold your hand?

How well are you catching your lover's signals?
Test your signal detection ability with 12 situations!

Just 3 minutes! Try it with your lover 💕

footer.slogan: An oasis of psychological tests to explore your mind
footer.disclaimer: The publisher may receive a commission through advertising
footer.address: Address: #607, 765 Taejang-ro, Gimpo-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea

startMessage.line1: "Confront? Avoid? Or empathize?"
startMessage.line2: Opinion conflicts with friends, fights with lovers, friction with colleagues...
startMessage.line3: Conflict in relationships is inevitable.
startMessage.line4: What matters is how you respond.
startMessage.line5:
Those who face it head-on,
Those who take time to think,
Those who read emotions first,
Those who solve with logic.
startMessage.line6: What is your conflict response style? 💬

compatibility.Type1_Type2: Perfect harmony of logic and emotion
compatibility.Type1_Type3: Clear and efficient with each other
compatibility.Type1_Type5: Need to balance directness vs flexibility
compatibility.Type2_Type4: Both tend to postpone problem solving
compatibility.Type4_Type5: Time vs quick adjustment speed difference
compatibility.Type4_Type1: Immediate vs time needed conflict intensification
compatibility.Type5_Type6: Frustrating even when compromise is suggested

startMessage.line1: Your way of loving, determined from childhood?
startMessage.line2: Why am I always anxious in relationships?
startMessage.line3: Why do I want to run away as we get closer?
startMessage.line4: Why do we hurt each other even when we love?
startMessage.line6: Just 3 minutes! First step to self-understanding 💚

startMessage.line1: "Me as I think vs Me as friends see me"

startMessage.line6:

Share with friends and compare results 😊

idealTypeTest.startMessageLine4: Someone you want to have deep conversations with, someone you want to laugh with, someone you want to hug, someone you want to conquer the world with.
idealTypeTest.startMessageLine5: Who is your real ideal type?

startMessage.title: Are you a flirting master?
startMessage.description1: People who act cool in front of someone they like, people who show their feelings too much.
startMessage.description2: People who maintain proper distance, people who are desperate to contact every day.
startMessage.description3: People who strategically delay replying to messages, people who read and reply immediately.
startMessage.question: What's your flirting skill level?
startMessage.fun: It's more fun when you compare with friends 😂
startMessage.time: Just 2 minutes! Try it with a smile 💕

startMessage.title: 「Why can't I find love? Let's find the real reason」
startMessage.line1: Do you meet people but relationships don't progress?
startMessage.line2: Do you date but relationships don't last? Do you feel awkward around people you like?
startMessage.line3: There's a reason why love isn't working out.
startMessage.line4: Is it excessive perfectionism? Low self-esteem? Past wounds? Unrealistic expectations?
startMessage.line5: We'll accurately identify the factors blocking your love life that you might not even realize.
startMessage.line6: You need to know the problem to solve it 💪
startMessage.line7: Takes only 3 minutes! Please answer honestly ✨

loveObstaclesTest.resultShareMessage: My love obstacle is {type}! What's your problem? Let's try together 😂💔

questions.q1: When you meet someone you like, what's your first thought?
questions.q2: When your date makes a mistake?
questions.q3: When love doesn't work out, what do you think?
questions.q4: What do you expect from your partner?
questions.q5: When you receive a confession, why do you hesitate?
questions.q6: How are you in the early stages of a relationship?
questions.q7: When you fight, what's your pattern?
questions.q8: What's the hardest part about love?
questions.q10: What do you often think about in a relationship?
questions.q11: How do you react after a breakup?
questions.q12: What worries you most before starting a relationship?

answers.q1a1: "Am I really good enough for them?"
answers.q1a3: "I need to prepare perfectly before approaching"
answers.q1a4: "Will it work realistically? What about conditions..."
answers.q2a1: "This is fine" and let it go generously
answers.q2a2: "This is a bit..." it bothers me
answers.q2a3: "Are you okay?" I check their feelings first
answers.q2a4: "How about doing it this way next time?" I give advice
